assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Renaissance Global Limited designs, manufactures, and sells diamond studded jewelry in India and internationally. The company offers gold jewelry, as well as bangles, pendant sets, and other products. It also engages in the retail and trade of cut and polished diamonds; gems; and furniture and accessories. The company operates two licensed brands, such as the Hallmark and Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry; and retail stores under the IRASVA brand name, as well as jewelry collection stores under the Disney Treasures and Disney Jewels brand name. The company was formerly known as Renaissance Jewellery Limited and changed its name to Renaissance Global Limited in March 2019. Renaissance Global Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Mumbai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Ghanashyam M. Walavalkar
companyOfficers.title: VP of Legal, Compliance Officer & Company Sec.
